creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
OSCOM "Editor`s View" link on
http://demo.wyona.org/lenya/oscom/introduction.html
is broken:

Message: Resource Not Found
Description: The requested resource "/lenya/oscom/authoring/" could not be found
Sender: org.apache.cocoon.servlet.CocoonServlet
Source: Cocoon Servlet

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I have "patched" the ResourceExistsAction in the case of the resources sitemap 
pipeline (file-exists), such that it only checks files and not directories.

Therefore URLs such as .../oscom/authoring/ are working again, but it seems to 
me that this is just a quick fix and we need to think of something better.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: The previous quote was from a mail sent by Michael Wechner.
